title: Café Coffee Day
content: Café Coffee Day, IIT Kharagpur (abbreviated as CCD ) is an outlet of the Indian café chain Café Coffee Day . It is located on the Scholars' Avenue opposite to Gokhle Hall of Residence in a cluster of restaurants along with Heritage , Vegies , and Baskin Robbins . CCD is a popular hangout joint among the students of Kharagpur.
CCD is one of the few establishments inside campus which is air conditioned. It is noted for its various coffee specialties, desserts, and a wide array of fast foods. They also accept card payments.
